examples:
Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cannot afford to pay this and have cancelled the subscription and not used- i dont re call signing up for pro i don't require the service please refund the amount thank you ! :

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I do not need the subscription further since it's not suiting my present requirements. It got automatically charged. Kindly refund me the same for I just needed to use the trial. Already cancelled my subscription. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, the subscription automatically renewed today without my knowledge. I just tried the trial version and found out that i don't require the service at the moment. Can you please refund me and cancel the subscription since I do not require the service? Thank you very much

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I tried the free trial of premium Canva and did not want to proceed to a subscription, however forgot to cancel before the required date. As goodwill are you please able to refund my subscription fee?
Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi there,
I had the free trial but i cancelled it but it didn’t work for some reason? I originally cancelled it because it didn’t meet my specific requirements. However, I have now realised that if was not cancelled and I have been charged. Can I please have a refund and finally cancel my account please? Thank you.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: hello last days I made a refund request and they said yes, thank you, but checking my bank statements the money never came in. therefore I require your help to find out what happened and call my bank.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: It was automatic renewal, I was not expecting to be charged. Please proceed with a refund for this as I did not use, and not intend to at this month.

My project will not require Canva Pro at this moment.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I was not aware this subscription was due for renewal and I am in a very unstable financial position at the moment and this transaction has taken almost all of my money. I do not require Canva pro, please cancel my subscription.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I am no longer with the company that required my use of this site. & can not afford the subscription.
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I ask for a refund 899 rubles. Please refund money. No subscription required, child has not turned off auto-renewal.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have honestly forgotten to cancel my trial subscription and was charge 5988-pesos. While canva has been very useful to me last month, I no longer have any work task that will require me to use it. Please cancel my membership and refund me 5988. Thank you very much.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi there,

I canceled my subscription but I just got charged. when I checked my subscription it says its active but I am positive I canceled it! can you please cancel the subscription and refund me for this purchase as I do not require it.

thank you.

Refund request reason: I tried to quit my trial but your website wasn’t working and the charge was automatically taken. I do not wish to sign up and require a refund immediately. Thank you.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>
Invoice #: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I currently have no job and cannot afford to pay for this subscription, so I require a refund, sorry for the inconvenience

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hiya, I cancelled my subscription to avoid a charge a day after I subscribed as I did not require the software.
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I could not cancel the subscription and I do not require the canva application ... I also do not have money to pay the membership.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not want to proceed with the subscription. I do not require this services.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I do not require canva pro, I remember canceling the subscription and today I am unfairly charged for 11.99 euros when I require this money to make purchases at home and help my mother. I appreciate help.
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Subscription not required automatically renewed. I ask for a refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I wasn’t aware of the automatic renewal and no longer require your services.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Subscription resumed yesterday, I didn't get to cancel Pro Canva version for one year. Refund required please. Thank you

Lidija Vojnovic
